org.springframework.data.redis.cache

类 RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.redis.cache.RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder
  • 封闭类:
    RedisCacheManager

    public static class RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder
extends Object
    Configurator for creating RedisCacheManager.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法

      RedisCacheManager build()
      Create new instance of RedisCacheManager with configuration options applied.
      RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder cacheDefaults(RedisCacheConfiguration defaultCacheConfiguration)
      Define a default RedisCacheConfiguration applied to dynamically created RedisCaches.
      RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder disableCreateOnMissingCache()
      Disable in-flight Cache creation for unconfigured caches.

      Entry point for builder style RedisCacheManager configuration.

      Entry point for builder style RedisCacheManager configuration.
      RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder initialCacheNames(Set<String> cacheNames)
      Append a Set of cache names to be pre initialized with current RedisCacheConfiguration.
      RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder transactionAware()
      Enable RedisCaches to synchronize cache put/evict operations with ongoing Spring-managed transactions.
      RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder withInitialCacheConfigurations(Map<String,RedisCacheConfiguration> cacheConfigurations)
      Append a Map of cache name/RedisCacheConfiguration pairs to be pre initialized.

      • fromConnectionFactory

        public static RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder fromConnectionFactory(org.springframework.data.redis.connection.RedisConnectionFactory connectionFactory)
        Entry point for builder style RedisCacheManager configuration.
        参数:
        connectionFactory - must not be null.
        返回:
        new RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder.

      • fromCacheWriter

        public static RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder fromCacheWriter(RedisCacheWriter cacheWriter)
        Entry point for builder style RedisCacheManager configuration.
        参数:
        cacheWriter - must not be null.
        返回:
        new RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder.

      • cacheDefaults

        public RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder cacheDefaults(RedisCacheConfiguration defaultCacheConfiguration)
        Define a default RedisCacheConfiguration applied to dynamically created RedisCaches.
        参数:
        defaultCacheConfiguration - must not be null.
        返回:
        this RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder.

      • transactionAware

        public RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder transactionAware()
        Enable RedisCaches to synchronize cache put/evict operations with ongoing Spring-managed transactions.
        返回:
        this RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder.

      • initialCacheNames

        public RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder initialCacheNames(Set<String> cacheNames)
        Append a Set of cache names to be pre initialized with current RedisCacheConfiguration. NOTE: This calls depends on cacheDefaults(RedisCacheConfiguration) using whatever default RedisCacheConfiguration is present at the time of invoking this method.
        参数:
        cacheNames - must not be null.
        返回:
        this RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder.

      • withInitialCacheConfigurations

        public RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder withInitialCacheConfigurations(Map<String,RedisCacheConfiguration> cacheConfigurations)
        Append a Map of cache name/RedisCacheConfiguration pairs to be pre initialized.
        参数:
        cacheConfigurations - must not be null.
        返回:
        this RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder.

      • disableCreateOnMissingCache

        public RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder disableCreateOnMissingCache()
        Disable in-flight Cache creation for unconfigured caches.

        RedisCacheManager.getMissingCache(String) returns null for any unconfigured Cache instead of a new RedisCache instance. This allows eg. CompositeCacheManager to chime in.

        返回:
        this RedisCacheManager.RedisCacheManagerBuilder.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0.4

      • build

        public RedisCacheManager build()
        Create new instance of RedisCacheManager with configuration options applied.
        返回:
        new instance of RedisCacheManager.
